head.title: A Field of 11 In Mother Goose

hedline.hl1: A Field of 11 In Mother Goose

block.p: The leadership of this year's class of 3-year-old fillies will be on the line tomorrow when a strong field of 11 fillies meets at Belmont Park in the $200,000 Mother Goose Stakes, the middle race in the Triple Tiara series.

The leadership of this year's class of 3-year-old fillies will be on the line tomorrow when a strong field of 11 fillies meets at Belmont Park in the $200,000 Mother Goose Stakes, the middle race in the Triple Tiara series.

The entries, filed yesterday, include Jersey Girl, who won her fifth straight race three weeks ago when she captured the Acorn, the opening race in the series; Keeper Hill, winner of the Kentucky Oaks at Churchill Downs last month; Added Gold, winner of the Black Eyed Susan Stakes at Pimlico, and Countess Diana, last year's juvenile filly champion.
